overview: The most insane rock musical where anything goes! Nominated for 5 Tony Awards, the ROCKY HORROR SHOW is a worldwide phenomenon and an absolute must-see! An evening full of irresistible rock music where it is difficult to sit still. An evening when finally everything is allowed again. The world hit is coming to the Netherlands and premieres in ITA! Starring Sven Ratzke, Esm√©e Dekker, Ellen Pieters, Samir Hassan and Yoran de Bont among others.
title: The Rocky Horror Show Live 2021
